title: Add Roblox game card and iframe embed

requirements.summary: Add a Roblox game card to the GameLibrary section following the existing GameCard component pattern with thumbnail, genre badge, title, description, and Play Now button styled with neon arcade theme
acceptanceCriteria: A Roblox game card appears in the GameLibrary grid alongside the existing 10 games.
The card displays a thumbnail image, a genre badge, the title 'Roblox', a short description, and a 'Play Now' button.
The card styling matches the existing neon arcade theme and GameCard component pattern.

file_operations.description: Add a new GameCard component instance for Roblox with thumbnail path 'frontend/public/assets/generated/roblox-thumb.dim_400x300.png', genre 'Sandbox', title 'Roblox', description text, accent color variant, and /play/roblox route. Insert it into the existing grid alongside the 10 current games.

requirements.summary: Add an iframe embed play page for Roblox at route /play/roblox using https://www.roblox.com/games, consistent with existing GamePlayPage pattern
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Play Now' on the Roblox card navigates to /play/roblox.
The play page embeds https://www.roblox.com/games in a full-width iframe.
The page includes the standard toolbar (navigation, fullscreen, external link) consistent with other GamePlayPage instances.

file_operations.description: Add a game entry for Roblox (id: 'roblox', name: 'Roblox', url: 'https://www.roblox.com/games') to the games array so the existing GamePlayPage component can render it via the /play/roblox route.

requirements.summary: Update the Header and Footer components to reflect the expanded game count (now 11 games total)
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer game list includes Roblox alongside all existing 10 games.

file_operations.description: Update the game count badge text from '10 GAMES' to '11 GAMES' to reflect the addition of Roblox.
Add 'Roblox' to the games list array in the Footer component so it displays alongside the existing 10 games in the footer section.
